alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:29AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN HARDING, SOUTH CENTRAL UNION AND EASTERN MORA COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM MDT... At 1229 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Bueyeros to 7 miles west of Roy. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roy, Bueyeros and Solano. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Union County
